channel.title: DNN Quantization on Haoran You
channel.description: Recent content in DNN Quantization on Haoran You

item.title: [NeurIPS 2020] FracTrain: Fractionally Squeezing Bit Savings Both Temporally and Spatially for Efficient DNN Training
item.description: Accepted as NeurIPS 2020 regular paper! Abstract: Recent breakthroughs in deep neural networks (DNNs) have fueled a tremendous demand for intelligent edge devices featuring on-site learning, while the practical realization of such systems remains a challenge due to the limited resources available at the edge and the required massive training costs for state-of-the-art (SOTA) DNNs.
